4973293 4974979 They think we can save them.
4978264 4980663 You resisted my attempt to imprint you.

4985739 4989174 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4989175 4990598 That is how they change things.
4990825 4992241 That is how they built this city.

4992468 4995234 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface,
5005639 5006940 So why do they need you?
5007272 5008784 When they first brought us here,
5009065 5011184 they extracted what was in us.
5011464 5013340 So they could store the information,
5013462 5015334 remix it like so much paint,

5015455 5017903 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.
5017985 5020428 But they still needed an artist,

5023376 5026409 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind,

5029016 5032009 So they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist,
5033720 5035962 But they made me delete everything else.

5044042 5046911 Can you imagine
what it is like being forced,
5058778 5060319 This was blank when I found it!

5066019 5070105 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication, as it is with all of us.

5070758 5073293 You made those drawings
happen with your gift.
5073294 5075010 You say they brought us here.
5165015 5167246 There is nothing beyond the city.
5222610 5225390 And now you know the truth.

5293415 5295832 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch,
5296217 5298261 or it will result in this one's death, yes?

5300327 5302356 She's not my real wife!
She's nothing to me!
5306902 5309247 You see, I have become the monster,
5313134 5315352 Shall I end her life now

5393942 5396988 But he can also lead us
to what we seek.
5397285 5400182 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400722 5404206 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.
5404459 5407072 We no longer need the other subjects.
5407228 5410317 The time for study is over.
5411130 5415097 It is time to be one with John Murdoch.
5456011 5457777 They want to make you one of them,
5458404 5460582 so they can share your soul.
5471138 5473509 The pain will only last a moment.

5487610 5489611 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5498487 5501723 Now remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.

5503613 5506515 You're probably wondering why
I keep appearing in your memories.

5506670 5508937 It is because I have inserted
myself in them.

5512902 5516210 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5532887 5534614 You're getting the hang of it, John.
5535053 5537064 Maybe one day I'll be working for you.
5537793 5539925 This is the machine the strangers use
5546492 5548187 I know you can beat them, John.
5562851 5565129 There is no time for romance, John.
5565621 5567205 The world can be what you make it.

5570059 5572627 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5859016 5860516 I knew you could do it, John.
5866624 5868764 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5870928 5872461 So give her back her memories.
5873383 5875497 The facility where the strangers stored
5880535 5882414 What are you going to do now, John?
5884775 5886387 You told me I had the power,

5889013 5891778 I can make these machines
do anything I want.
5893150 5894932 Make this world anything I want it to be.

6093538 6096296 I'm just making a few little changes

6096565 6098606 Are we sure that's what we want?
6099057 6100858 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103370 6106284 Your imprint is not

6107299 6109310 But I wanted to know what it was like...
6112670 6114896 You know how I was supposed to feel.

6119630 6122958 You wanted to know what it was

6124020 6125550 Well, you're not going to find it,
